Question
========

Which of the following functions are good to use in package code? 

Answerlist
----------

* `setwd()`
* `library()`
* `require()`
* `source()`
* none of these

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* No, you shouldn't use `setwd()` in package code
* No, you shouldn't use `library()` in package code
* No, you shouldn't use `require()` in package code
* No, you shouldn't use `source()` in package code
* Correct.
